simplified: 有意栽花花不发，无心插柳柳成阴

pronunciation.pinyin: yǒu yì zāi huā huā bù fā , wú xīn chā liǔ liǔ chéng yīn
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: you3 yi4 zai1 hua1 hua1 bu4 fa1 , wu2 xin1 cha1 liu3 liu3 cheng2 yin1

details.simplified: 有意栽花花不发，无心插柳柳成阴
details.traditional: 有意栽花花不發，無心插柳柳成陰

meanings.value: you plant a garden and the flowers do not bloom, you poke a stick in the mud and it grows into a tree
fig. things do not always turn out as one would expect
well-laid plans may fail, and success may come where you least expect it
